scripts.build: yarn workspace ghost run build || echo 'No Ghost build step required'
scripts.setup: yarn && git submodule update --init && NODE_ENV=development node .github/scripts/setup.js
scripts.docker:build: yarn docker:clean && docker compose build ghost
scripts.docker:clean: echo "Deleting node_modules volumes..." && COMPOSE_PROFILES=${COMPOSE_PROFILES:-ghost} docker compose down --remove-orphans && docker volume ls -q -f name=ghost_node_modules | xargs -I{} docker volume rm {}
scripts.docker:mysql: COMPOSE_PROFILES=${COMPOSE_PROFILES:-ghost} docker compose up mysql -d --wait && docker compose exec mysql mysql -u root -proot ghost
scripts.docker:sleep: COMPOSE_PROFILES=${COMPOSE_PROFILES:-ghost} docker compose run -d --name ghost-devcontainer --rm -it ghost /bin/bash -c 'sleep infinity'
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d --wait
scripts.docker:restart: docker compose down && docker compose up -d --wait
scripts.main:monorepo: git checkout main && git pull ${GHOST_UPSTREAM:-origin} main && yarn
scripts.main:submodules: git submodule sync && git submodule update && git submodule foreach "git checkout main && git pull ${GHOST_UPSTREAM:-origin} main"
